headline: BofA Flags Rising Oversupply Risk in Natural Gas, Trims View on National Fuel Gas (NFG)
summary: National Fuel Gas Company (NYSE:NFG) is included among the 14 Best Mid-Cap Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. On January 16, BofA trimmed its price target on National Fuel Gas Company (NYSE:NFG) to $99 from $102. It maintained an Underperform rating on the stock. headline: BofA Keeps an Underperform Rating on Sigma Lithium Corporation (SGML)
summary: Sigma Lithium Corporation (NASDAQ:SGML) is among the 7 Best Lithium and Battery Stocks to Buy Right Now. TheFly reported on January 15, 2026, that BofA kept its Underperform rating. headline: Bank Margins, Earnings Set To Expand, Possibly Defy Credit Concerns
summary: US bank earnings have continued to grow as strong margin expansion and benign credit quality supported performance. Read more here.
